TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoleGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 将 控件中的内容模板与为网站定义的一个或多个角色关联。

span.span: Associates a content template in a control with one or more roles defined for the Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用控件定义一组包含向网站用户显示的内容的内容模板基于 Web 站点管理员分配的角色。You can use the control to define a set of content templates that contain the content that is displayed to Web site users based on the role assigned by Web site administrators. 类由控制将内容模板与一组角色关联。The class is used by the control to associate a content template with a set of roles. 若要将模板动态分配给角色组中，设置引用添加到实现的对象的属性接口。To dynamically assign a template to the role group, set the property to a reference to an object that implements the interface. 你必须配置要使用的角色管理类。You must configure role management to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将分配到一个自定义模板属性。The following code example assigns a custom template to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[RoleGroupClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RoleGroupClass/CS/rolegroupclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RoleGroupClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RoleGroupClass/VB/rolegroupclassvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ContainsUser(class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal user) cil managed
Public Function ContainsUser (user As IPrincipal) As Boolean

param.name: user
param.span: 要在角色组中查找的用户名。

span.span: The user name to look for in the role group.

summary.span: 指示指定的用户是否为角色组中任一角色的成员。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified user is a member of any of the roles in the role group.

returns.span: 如果用户是与该角色组关联的角色之一的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is a member of one of the roles associated with this role group; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回`true`如果指定的用户是任何与此角色组关联的角色的成员。The method returns `true` if the specified user is a member of any of the roles associated with this role group. 中列出的顺序搜索角色属性，并且搜索停止后找到第一个匹配项。Roles are searched in the order they are listed in the property, and searching stops after the first match is found. 此方法使用方法来确定用户是否为角色的成员。This method uses the method to determine whether a user is a member of a role. 你必须配置要使用的角色管理方法。You must configure role management to use the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ContentTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与该角色组关联的内容模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the content template associated with this role group.
The associated with this role group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含向此角色组的成员的用户显示的内容。The property contains the content that is displayed to users who are members of this role group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例动态创建的内容的模板。The following code example dynamically creates a content template. summary.span: 获取或设置与该角色组关联的角色。

span.span: Gets or sets the roles associated with this role group.

value.span: 与该角色组关联的用逗号分隔的角色列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of roles associated with this role group.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将分配的角色将与角色组关联的列表。The following code example assigns a list of roles to associate with a role group. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 返回与该角色组关联的用逗号分隔的角色列表。

span.span: Returns a comma-separated list of the roles associated with this role group.

returns.span: 与该角色组关联的用逗号分隔的角色列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the roles associated with this role group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的内容作为以逗号分隔列表的角色的组关联的角色的属性。The method returns the contents of the property as a comma-separated list of roles associated with the role group.
